title: `--rpc.allow-unprotected-txs` flag is not defined, but IT IS in flags.go
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: v2.50.1

OS & Version: Docker image

Chain/Network: Sepolia

#### Expected behaviour

Can use the flag `--rpc.allow-unprotected-txs=true
`
#### Actual behaviour
`flag provided but not defined: -rpc.allow-unprotected-txs`

I think that it should be supported as it is defined here https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/blob/devel/cmd/utils/flags.go#L479

Am I doing something wrong or is it a bug?

More info:
`-rpc.allow-unprotected-txs` is not available as an option
